channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4549] Registration: Data Model Changes
item.description:
Data model changes in context of parent ticket, as per specification here:
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/901a+-+Specification+Shop+BE

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5036] Disable address selection in checkout for existing open order
item.description:
When the customer checkout with an existing open order the address selection part must be displayed in read-only.
Then all the radio buttons should be disabled. (see screenshoot)

Additionally, when the selection of the existing open order is done, the checkout address page should be reloaded to display the existing open order billing and shipping addresses selected.
item.summary: Disable address selection in checkout for existing open order

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
It seems that is not possible to display the currently selected addresses that comes from the Open Order since the addresses are duplicated in SAP, and they are different from the addresses related to the customer.
This beavior is correct because when an open order is created in sap, the addresses that belongs to him must be a copy of the original address.

So its not possible to display the selected shipping and billing addresses.

The solution is to completely hide the address table in checkoutaddress page in case of existing open order is selected.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4790] DE Webshop // Customer creation - Bundesland field as an obligatory field
item.description:
In the Customer Creation form (both consumer, business and Guest orders)

need to have a drop down with the list of Bundesländer. http://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Land_(Deutschland)

There is a legal requirement of having the region field maintained in the customer master for Germany. This is necessary in order to cover the different legal requirements per region that are requested in Germany.
It seems that we need to enhance the Webshop customer creation in order to accept also this information.
The region field is a 2 digit code and a codelist is maintained in SAP. From the described change I see that 2 interfaces will be affected:
IF08 -> Customer Creation
IF08 -> Customer read
IF50 -> Codelist interface.

IF-08: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-08+Customer+Service
Codelist: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+Region
item.summary: DE Webshop // Customer creation - Bundesland field as an obligatory field

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Implementation is done in the feature branch for the registration.
@Francesco: Please merge back the feature branch to trunk, thanks!
Migrated to trunk.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4612] IF-16 Invoice Search Results doesn't contain the invoiceDocUrl
item.description:
the url of the pdf invoice is not present in the response.
could you please insert it as described in the specification?

https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-16+Invoice+Service
item.summary: IF-16 Invoice Search Results doesn't contain the invoiceDocUrl

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Ligja, could you please assign this to Neeraj if complete from your side?
We need it for DEV and Q for new SAP DE.
Thx

Hi Florian

Ligia would like to know what is expected in the field <invoiceDocID>

in the specs we have

invoiceDocUrl String 255 no
(Storno has no document) http://..... URL to invoice PDF used to get document.
We should get an URL pointing to the invoice PDF there.

hi Ligia

is the answer from Florian clearer?

if not, we need to wait until Evangelos comes back

Hi Oana,

From technical point of view it is not clear because I don't know where this URL is stored / how it is generated.

In JIRA the last comment of Evangelos was: "Skip that at the moment. We can't do anything for the PDF at the moment as we haven't activated archivelink."

Best Regards,
Ligia
Any news here?

Hello Florian,
We have done our part and we return the link. I think Nabil is wokring on another ticket so I believe this should be closed now.

Hi Evangelos,

I tested the IF InvoiceSearch. Yes invoiceDocId is coming on response xml. But not for every invoice. Is it suppose to be like that or it is a fault. Please check the following request and response :-

Request xml :-

   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

            <invoiceDocId><![CDATA[http://198.18.0.109:1090/ContentServer/ContentServer.dll?get&pVersion=0046&contRep=P2&docId=00215A9B0B081ED488DBEBE16B03C4ED&compId=data&accessMode=r&authId=CN%3DQ10,OU%3DI0020823210,OU%3DSAPWebAS,O%3DSAPTrustCommunity,C%3DDE&expiration=20140912094446&%2Fz7MAkGByqGSM44BAMELjAsAhRzGQj5i6gkRnHKws2rX%2FqahlcEzAIUX770JZJu7I33rjST71glC9OEG34%3D]]></invoiceDocId>

The functionality was off and not all the documents has a pdf stored linked to them. Only the newly created invoices. no problem here

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4547] Registration: Addition of addtl or offline users to existing customer
item.description:
• Context:
    • currently, each registration leads to a new customer
    • only a B2B admin can add additional users to his customer account
    • there can only be one admin
    • for some countries, this is not sufficient: self-registration of additional users is needed, whereas user management by an admin is not a requirement
    • implementation of this change can be combined with the registration of existing offline customers feature
  • Requirements:
    • as per the list on the spec page: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/901+-+Customer+Data+Model%2C+Migration%2C+Registration+Process+Adaptations
  • Stakeholder
    • ELFA business
    • Original requirements

Next Steps
Specification
Business Approval
Clarification of last open questions regarding spec
Implementation
item.summary: Registration: Addition of addtl or offline users to existing customer

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Implementation is pending business approval!

1.5 d Detail specification + support business decisions
1 d Changes in data model / hMC configuration / documentation
1 d Extend Interface IF-08: lookupPrivateCustomer/lookupBusinessCustomer (spec + impl)
1 d Adapt existing B2B / B2C registration to implement R7.1 (avoid duplicate customers)
3 d Shop Pages & Components: Implement self-registration feature
2 d Additional (optional) approval workflow step in registration process
4 d Business logic
1 d Coordination with Lodestone
2 d Testing
Total: 16.5
To be clarified: Coordination with Lodestone needed. Needed SAP changes (not estimated above) need to happen at the same time!

Lodestone has implemented the new operation in the Web Service.
The new WSDL is available here:
http://10.191.64.53:52400/dir/wsdl?p=ic/b3f95196b2a83b3bb8f4e2ebc1600cda

This ticket represent the new specification for the existing customer/contact registration.
The previous ticket DISTRELEC-4077 that was related to the registration only of an existing customer will become deprecated.

Hi Ruben
the frontend part is needed to allow the B2B and B2C Customer to register via existing registration process.
Start integration testing.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4355] R3 Feature: Invoice History
item.description:
Requirement

  • Initial Situation:
    • Currently only order history, no invoice info available (as movex could not deliver this)
  • Requirement:
    • Invoice history screen in my account
    • IF part of different ticket
  • Stakeholder:
    • Original webshop requirement
  • Discussion Points:
    • -

Prototype: http://concept-webshop-distrelec.namics.com/2014_04_03/start.html
Spec:
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/P404-Invoice+History
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/C204-CustomerAccountList

Next Steps
Specification (basically done, needs validation)
Estimate (initial provisional estimate of 3d added, may change)
Planning
Implementation

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
As per Evangelos: Feature built in SAP and ready to use by the shop

See related ticket DISTRELEC-2574 for progress already done

Hi Nando

As discussed with Evangelos, the IF-16 service is not available for Elfa.
This service is available for DE (new SAP) but this shop is not implemented locally for the moment.

Let me know when I should continue this task.

Regards

Hi Florian

Let me know when I can start again please
HP Q DE should be ready on 20th of July.
Waiting for the URL of the PDFs from SAP

Hi Florian,

A solution has been developed , to read pdf from internal url and display on webshop.

It will be available for testing in next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4301] Compare // line-breaks
item.description:
In the comparison-list, we urgently need line-breaks - otherwise we show incomplete information!
(most important = Description)

Examples: 912326/27 or 116900/01 or .... 117151/52 or 119315/17

It should look like the breaked text as on the first screenshot

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hello Rafael,

if we show the full text, in case we are comparing 2 elements with different text lenght...we will have a display issue (CompareTable.png)

I propose on mouse over title to avoid this. (CompareTableProposal.png)

Please tell me what you think
Thanks!

New estimation added. As discussed:
The attribute-line should be expanded dynamically for all the products in order to always display the full attribute and have everything on the same line aligned with the other products.
Local environment not ready to start dev
Please test it after the next deployment
